title: Blemish Buffing Beads
description: An ultra-gentle anti-acne version of Botanical Buffing Beads scrub that may be used on the face and body for the treatment and control of acne. Salicylic Acid helps clear up acne blemishes while a Glycolic Acid Complex and oil absorbing ingredients help produce flawless, clear skin. Soft, ultra-fine Jojoba Beads work in two ways. First, they help exfoliate surface dead skin cells without irritation, allowing acne treatment products to penetrate better. Then, the ultra-fine Jojoba beads help open clogged pores and release sebum that contributes to blackheads and whiteheads.Jojoba Beads - Tiny beads that gently help exfoliate & unclog pores. 1% Salicylic Acid (BHA) - Helps to loosen sebum within the pores and prevents future breakouts. Glycolic Acid Complex (AHA) - Exfoliates dead surface skin cells and helps stimulate cellular turnover (chemical exfoliation).

The soothingly fragrant essential oils of Sandalwood, Lavender, Orange and Clary Sage moisturize the skin, leaving it smooth and conditioned. Contains no artificial fragrance or color. Professional recommendation advised.  How it works:      Naturally-foaming Quillaja Saponaria Extract provides soap-free cleansing without stripping the skin's natural moisture balance.     Purifying essential oils of Tea Tree, Lemon, Eucalyptus and Rosemary invigorate the skin.     Panthenol and essential oils of Sandalwood and Lavender help to condition the skin.  We recommend that first-time Dermalogica users visit an authorized skin treatment professional for a client consultation in an ULTA store.  Dermalogica Skin Treatments available at all ULTA locations. Click here for more information.

title: African Black Soap Body Wash
description: Shea Moisture's African Black Soap Body Wash With Frankincense & Myrrh cleanses, hydrates and calms problem skin. Helps to balance oily skin for clearer complexions. Use daily.Shea Moisture's Story:Sofi Tucker started selling shea nuts at the village market in Bonthe, Sierra Leone in 1912. By age 19, the widowed mother of four was selling shea butter, african black soap and her homemade hair and skin preparations all over the countryside. Sofi Tucker was a grandmother and sheamoisture is her legacy. With the purchase of African Black Soap Body Wash it helps empower disadvantaged women to realize a brighter, healthier future.Benefits:Ethically traded ingredients sustainably produced; Pioneering community commerce and Fair Trade since 1912; Tested on their family for four generations. Never on animals.

title: Nooni Repair Turnover Peel Pad
description: Nooni's daily peel pads are a simple, efficient way to care for dull, flaky, and troubled skin. These 100% organic cotton pads are infused with an effective blend of AHA and BHA to safely exfoliate, tone, and brighten skin. Lactic and Glycolic acids slough away dead skin cells, blackheads, whiteheads, and excess sebum, promoting cell turnover and refreshing skin. A gentle dosage of Salicylic Acid also helps fight acne, while a powerful mix of brightening Niacinamide and soothing Willow Bark works to reduce redness and even out skin tone. Centella Asiatica also improves natural collagen production to strengthen and relieve damaged skin. Soaked in natural spa Carbonated Water that replenishes skin's moisture, each pad even features an embossed mesh side that physically exfoliates and a smooth side to hydrate and soften skin texture.

catalogs: Bath & Body, Bath & Shower, Shower Gel & Body Wash
title: Online Only Tea Tree Body Wash
description: The Body Shop Difference: When the seasons change, so can your skin - and sometimes not for the better. Tea Tree range with a triple blend of natural active ingredients - Community Trade tea tree oil, lemon tea tree, and tamanu oil - work together to keep skin clear by helping to prevent blemishes and blackheads, and controlling excess oil. No matter what kind of climate you live in, using the Tea Tree range as your daily skin care regime will help combat existing blemishes, prevent future breakouts, and control oil and shine all year long.  How it works:     Soap-free body wash helps seal skins natural moisture.     Community trade tea tree antibacterial properties protect skin.     Community trade lemon tea tree and tamanu oil gives clearer-looking skin.          Community Fair Trade organic tea tree oil comes from the foothills of Mount Kenya. Tea tree leaves are picked by hand and steam-distilled to release the oil. The Body Shop trades with the Kenya Organic Oil Farmers Association encourages sustainable and organic farming methods which help to preserve the area's natural biodiversity.          Vegetarian. Not Tested on Animals. Contains Community Fair Trade Ingredients. No Phthalates. No Triclosan. No GMO.

title: Satsuma Shower Gel
description: The Body Shop difference: Community Fair Trade organic soy oil is produced in Brazil, where industrial soy farming is driving the deforestation of the Amazon. Most of the deforestation is through burning and logging to create huge agribusiness soy farms. Because the Capanema Farmers practice sustainable farming methods without the use of chemicals, they are helping to preserve nature, as well as their traditional way of life. The Body Shop uses about 150 tons of soy oil a year - none of which, they can happily say, contributes to the destruction of the Amazon rainforest. 100% Vegetarian, Never Tested on Animals, Contains Community Fair Trade Ingredients, No Sulfates, No Phthalates, No GMOs, No Triclosan

African Rock Fig contains antioxidant Vitamin C, which helps keep skin looking youthful.  SheaMoisture fights poverty! 10% of SheaMoisture Community Commerce product sales go to women-led businesses, to support communities that supply ingredients for our products. We help fund training and infrastructure to help them manufacturer their own high quality goods in their countries, and get fair prices for their goods and labor. This helps them to earn a better living and support their families, making a better life possible within their communities. It's not a donation. It's an investment in a fairer world.

By age 19, the widowed mother of four was selling Shea Butter, African Black Soap and her homemade hair and skin preparations all over the country side. Sofi Tucker was our Grandmother and SheaMoisture is her legacy. With this purchase you help empower disadvantaged women to realize a brighter, healthier future.

This gently cleansing Sulfate & Paraben Free formula contains skin nourishing Vitamins A, B3, C, E & Pro-Vitamin B5 and an antioxidant rich Superfruit Blend that will leave your skin feeling clean, refreshed and vibrant.

catalogs: Bath & Body, Bath & Shower, Body Scrubs & Exfoliants
title: Latte Art Cappuccino Cream-In Scrub
description: Tony Moly's Latte Art Cappuccino Cream-In Scrub is a color-changing cream that takes care of a massage and keratin removal simultaneously. This scrub, with an additional massaging effect, contains the active ingredients of coffee and milk extracts, which work to remove: flaky, dry, dead skin cells and impurities from the skin, while also providing nutrition to the skin. The warm sensation produced when rubbing the color-changing scrub on the face removes impurities deep in the pores. The grains within the scrub make the skin smooth and glossy. In addition, the ingredient of peptide supplies firmness to the skin, and the ingredient of O2 Carrier Complex makes the facial contour slimmer.

catalogs: Bath & Body, Bath & Shower, Body Scrubs & Exfoliants
title: Sacha Inchi Omega 3,6,9 Rescue & Replenishing Hand & Body Scrub
description: Sacha Inchi Omega 3,6,9 Rescue & Replenishing Hand & Body Scrub helps to buff away dead and dehydrated skin while deeply moisturizing skin. Organic Raw Shea Butter hydrates and comforts skin with vitamins and essential fatty acids. Omega 3, 6, and 9 help rebuild skin's natural moisture barrier to lock in moisture.  Quinoa replenishes collagen and elastin while Rose of Jericho Extract binds moisture to skin for long-lasting hydration. Skin feels continuously hydrated and nourished. Made with natural and certified organic ingredients. Sacha Inchi Oil is rich in nourishing Omega-3-6-9 and antioxidant Vitamins A& E. Builds a nourishing moisture barrier on the skin. Quinoa is an ancient grain rich in protein and vitamins. Rose of Jericho draws in and helps hold essential hydration.

catalogs: Bath & Body, Bath & Shower, Shower Gel & Body Wash
title: Eucalyptus Body Wash
description: Whether used as a shower gel or body cleanser, Thymes Eucalyptus Body Wash energizes and invigorates, leaving you feeling centered, open and ready to take on the day. Contains skin-quenching jojoba oil, hydrating honey and soothing aloe vera. Popular with both men and women. With notes of invigorating eucalyptus oil, crisp Italian lemon, energizing petitgrain, sweet bergamot, lively lemongrass and lush fir.

catalogs: Men, Hair, Shampoo
title: The 3-in-1 Shampoo, Conditioner & Body Wash
description: Although it's unlikely to do a better job than separate body wash, shampoo, and conditioner, if you're going to the gym or for a weekend away, there's nothing more convenient.Key Benefits:Formulated with oud fragrance; Body wash, shampoo and conditioner all in one; Cleanses and eliminates buildup; ProVitaminB5 provides moisture and improves elasticity; Paraben, sulfate and cruelty free

catalogs: Bath & Body, Bath & Shower, Body Scrubs & Exfoliants
title: Coffee Scrub
description: Enjoy Maui Babe's Coffee Scrub comprised of a custom blend of natural ingredients! Everyone has times where we have dry flaky skin that lotion just can't seem to repair. What's even worse is the peeling that happens after a sunburn and can seem like an eternity to fix! This coffee scrub will help scrub away the dry, peeling, flaky skin and encourage fresh skin cell renewal. The caffeine in the coffee will help stimulate blood flow to the area being treated and the essential oils will help to moisturize the new skin cells brought forward. Following up with Maui Babe's Body Butter is recommended to keep your new skin amazingly soft.

A lush blend of Vitamins A, B3, C, E & Pro Vitamin B5 and our unique Superfruit blend of Acai, Goji, Coffee, Noni, Pomegranate, Green Tea & Mangosteen helps nourish and revive skin.

title: Pink Grapefruit Shower Gel
description: The Body Shop Pink Grapefruit Shower Gel is a soap-free body wash that contains real pink grapefruit seed oil and has a refreshing citrus scent.Soap-free; Lather-rich; Refreshing grapefruit scent; Enriched with Community Trade Honey from Ethiopia; Pairs perfectly with our Pink Grapefruit Body ButterThe Body Shop source's their Community Trade honey from the UNESCO Sheka Forest Biosphere Reserve in the southern region of Ethiopia, where African bees distil the nectar of rainforest flowers to create a distinctive floral honey. To collect this precious honey, we work with the "bee whisperers" of Beza Mar, a group dedicated to improving the livelihood of Ethiopian beekeeping communities and maintaining their traditional, natural way of working with bees. Our Community Trade honey skin products aid miniaturization for soft, smooth skin and hair.

title: African Wild Water Mint Hand & Body Scrub
description: SheaMoisture's African Water Mint and Ginger Detox Scrub gently exfoliates dead skin while clearing away impurities.  This detoxifying sugar scrub, enriched with certified organic Shea Butter, African Water Mint, Activated Charcoal and Opuntia Extracts helps dissolve surface impurities, evens skin tone, and boosts skin's radiance.  Leaves all skin types feeling smooth and invigorated with an exhilarating scent.African Water Mint Rejuvenates and refreshes for an invigorating experience.; Ginger Extract is loaded with antioxidants for healthier skin.; Activated Charcoal absorbs oil and impurities to help detoxify and soothe.SheaMoisture's Story: Sofi Tucker started selling Shea Nuts at the village market in Bonthe, Sierra Leone in 1912. By age 19, the widowed mother of four was selling Shea Butter, African Black Soap and her homemade hair and skin preparations all over the countryside. Sofi Tucker was the Grandmother and SheaMoisture is her legacy. With this purchase you help empower disadvantaged women to realize a brighter, healthier future. Ethically Traded Ingredients Sustainably Produced. Pioneering Community Commerce and Fair Trade Since 1912.Tested on the Tucker family for four generations. Never on animals.

description: SheaMoisture's Fruit Fusion Coconut Water Energizing Bubble Bath & Body Wash gently cleanses while restoring light hydration and energizing dry, dull skin. By age 19, the widowed mother of four was selling shea butter, african black soap and her homemade hair and skin preparations all over the countryside. Sofi Tucker was a grandmother and sheamoisture is her legacy. With the purchase of African Black Soap Body Wash it helps empower disadvantaged women to realize a brighter, healthier future.Benefits:Ethically traded ingredients sustainably produced; Pioneering community commerce and Fair Trade since 1912; Tested on their family for four generations. Never on animals.; Made in the USA.

The cocoa butter we receive from the Farmer's Union helps make up the luxurious, moisturizing, nourishing bath & body products we offer, and gives back to the Union by providing a steady income so that they can improve their living standards and invest for the future.

Each woman takes two days to carefully produce the 25kg of butter; the rich kernels of 28 shea nuts are packed into every ultra-moisturizing Shea Body Butter. Our trade partnership with the Tungteiya Association has provided them with income and money to fund water pipes, access medial care and better housing and education. The Body Shop's babassu oil supplier, The Cooperative of Agricultural Producers of Lago de Junco (COPPALJ) is based in the north-eastern state of Maranhão in Brazil. It comprises over 150 members from 12 communities. The babassu palm tree has become an important subsistence resource in Maranhão, where over 300,000 families harvest babassu oil and are often dependent upon this activity for their economic survival. COPPALJ provides a fair wage, and also helps to lobby on behalf of babassu-harvesting communities to help them protect the forest and their livelihood. catalogs: Bath & Body, Hand & Foot Care, Hand & Foot Treatment
title: Original Exfoliant Foot Peel
description: Baby Foot is designed to remove the unsightly, dead skin cells on your feet that build up over time and can contribute to numerous problems associated with the soles of your feet. Dead skin cells accumulate due to pressure and friction from ordinary activities such as standing, exercising, and wearing shoes. In many cases, feet become cracked and painful from the accumulation of dead skin. In the past, frequent use of foot files and razors were used to "remove" the dead skin on your feet. However, this was a temporary fix because as we now know from recent research, filing generates more friction to the soles of your feet which in turn creates more dead skin. No more filing with the use of Baby Foot Original Exfoliant Foot Peel.Baby Foot is an unparalleled, total foot care package that provides you with the opportunity to care for and maintain your feet at home. Our scientifically formulated product contains 17 types of natural extracts which exfoliate and moisturize at the same time. The principal ingredient of Baby Foot is fruit acid which is very gentle, when compared with other acids. The fruit acid penetrates into the layers of dead skin cells and breaks down the desmosomes which hold the layers together. By this process, skin is undamaged but peels easily away from the fresh layer beneath. After peeling, your feet are reborn just like a baby's foot, giving you healthy, beautiful feet.

Wider blade

No-mess clippings catcher
Stainless steel

CARE: Keep me clean for good hygiene-wipe blades with alcohol after use. To empty clippings catcher, simply pull catcher down. Replace catcher and close handle for storage.

catalogs: Bath & Body, Personal Care, Teeth Whitening
title: Super White Snap Packs
description: A whiter smile in just 1 week, without trays! Created as an alternative to expensive dentist-office whitening and messy at-home options, this groundbreaking product has whitened millions of smiles. Each single-use applicator contains a capsule of effective yet gentle whitening serum.Smile Whitening System is so easy to use, just apply the serum morning and night for 7 days. It penetrates to whiten teeth inside and out, without sensitivity, then dissolves cleanly away. It's a fast, easy way to give your smile a fresh, white start! This clinically-proven system is the foundation on which Go Smile's ongoing innovation is based: the patented, airtight applicator protects the potency of the whitening serum until it's applied.A simple, comfortable experience eliminates the most common frustrations with traditional whitening products. Reliable results for everyone! The formula significantly whitens light-to moderately-stained teeth in a week, and visibly improves badly-stained teeth. It's the ideal "entry-level" whitener!

catalogs: Bath & Body, Personal Care, Cellulite & Stretch Marks
title: Scar Gel with Allantoin, Allicin and Panthenol
description: This unique blend of botanical extracts will help soften, smooth, and diminish the appearance of scars, especially those that are lumpy, bumpy or discolored. The herbal ingredients help breakdown scar tissue and encourage healthy natural-looking tissue growth. It is equally effective in reducing the appearance of stretch marks, burns, calluses and other skin hardenings, and will help heal minor burns or skin overexposed to the sun. This non-oily formula will not stain clothes.Product is Gluten Free, paraben free, hypoallergenic and is not tested on animals.

catalogs: Skin Care, Moisturizers, Face Moisturizer
title: SD Advanced Intensive Concentrate For Wrinkles & Stretch Marks
description: What is it? StriVectin's anti-wrinkle face cream introduces their most potent combination of anti-aging technologies yet. Collagex-CE Wrinkle Repair Complex and patented NIA-114 combine to help transform the look of your skin, starting in just 15 days. For anyone who wants to visibly diminish the look of fine lines and wrinkles and dramatically transform the look of their skin - SD Advanced is the best skin care solution. How does it work? New advances in skincare science have revealed that Collagen III, or Youth Collagen, is critical for baby soft, smooth skin. StriVectin SD Advanced is the first product to harness technology to target youth collagen for impressive anti-wrinkle clinical results in just 15 days. Your skin will show a dramatic difference in the appearance of wrinkles with a skin surface that looks visibly plumped, renewed and revitalized.

catalogs: Makeup, Makeup Brushes & Tools, Brow & Lash Tools
title: Women's Facial Trimmer
description:
Comfortably remove unwanted hair with Panasonic's Women's Facial Trimmer. Quickly, safely and completely remove unwanted hair on the face, chin, neck and other areas. The trimmer's smooth-pivoting head swings 10 degrees to the left and right to follow the natural contours of your face for close, comfortable results. Ultra-thin, hypo-allergenic stainless-steel blades and a unique rounded blade tip ensure gentle, precision trimming on even the most sensitive skin. And because these sharp, long-lasting blades are designed for optimum results when used dry, there's no need to apply soap or lotion before trimming. You can even trim over make-up.

Two precision, snap-on combs are included to easily and expertly groom eyebrows to your perfect length. The stylish wand design fits naturally and comfortably in your hand. And it slips easily into any drawer or beauty kit for convenient storage, or into any bag or purse to take with you everywhere.

Benefits:

    Comfortable pivoting head gently trims face, chin and neck
    Trim and detail eyebrows with two comb attachments
    Hypo-allergenic blades are safe on sensitive skin
    Fits comfortably in your hand, slips easily into bag or purse

Key Features:

    Compact wand design
    Pivoting Head
    Hypo-Allergenic Stainless-Steel Blades
    Two Comb Attachments
    Battery Operated (1 AAA / not included0

Blue color makes for easy-to-see application. For hair removal on face or body. Microwaveable for fast, easy at-home use.A $86.00 Value!Poetic Waxing Kit Includes:3 large spatulas; 3 small spatulas; One free ingrown eliminating pad sample; Wax-filled cup (5.3 oz.); Super skin cleanser (1.0 oz.); Pre- and post-waxing oil (1.0 oz.)

description: The Sit Tight Super Intense 4-D system was developed to help stimulate skin around the thighs, hips and bottom by delivering slow-release microencapsulated ingredients that optimize while you sit. With a unique ingredient mix designed to help firm and smooth the appearance of stubborn problem areas. Skin feels firmer in 14 days (results of independent user trial on 54 people). Sweet almond oil, glycerin and olive oil help to smooth, moisturize and condition the skin. With sweet orange oil to help revitalize and tone the skin and a fragrance blend with  aromatic essential  oils including   petitgrain, lemongrass,  rosemary, eucalyptus, ylang ylang, elemi, lime & palmarosa.

catalogs: Bath & Body, Personal Care, Deodorant
title: Underarm Deodorant Wipes with Coconut Milk & Essential Oils
description: Pacifica Underarm Deodorant Wipes are an innovative formula utilizing natural ingredients with effective odor control and protection that can last for hours. Designed to stop the malodors under your arms and remove the excess perspiration. Use as a deodorant under your arms in the morning. Take with you for reapplication as needed.  Great for times when showering is not an option, after yoga, camping trips, and times of high stress. This is an everyday solution to deodorizing while leaving a subtle scent that blends with everything else you layer on. A distinctive blend of natural essential oils and coconut milk, these odor-neutralizing, aluminum-free wipes keep you feeling fresh and fabulous all day long. Simply wipe on as an underarm deodorant, or throw into bag for an on-the-go refresher.Perfect for spring and summer, each bag contains biodegradable natural wipes infused with ingredients your skin will love. Subtly scented to blend with everything else you layer on. Formulated without: animal ingredients (including carmine, beeswax and lanolin), animal testing. FD&C colors, mineral oil, parabens, phthalates, petroleum, propylene glycol, SLS, gluten, peanut oil and other ingredients you don't want on your skin.

title: Ingrown Hair Eliminating Pads
description: Bliss Ingrown Hair Eliminating Pads are soaked in exfoliating alpha hydroxy and beta hydroxyl acid, along with botanical soothers to help prevent post waxing or post shaving ingrown hairs.These pads gently exfoliate with salicylic acid and glycolic acid for smoother bump-free skin. Oat extract, witch hazel and lavender oil soothe and smooth skin making these a must-have between waxing or shaving sessions.

catalogs: Bath & Body, Bath & Shower, Shower Gel & Body Wash
title: Anti-Cellulite Body Wash in a Sponge
description:
Spongeables Anti-Cellulite Body Wash in a sponge is the first luxurious body wash with built-in anti-cellulite benefits. New infusion technology blends a gentle cleansing gel, premium quality moisturizers and powerful anti-oxidants, transforming an ordinary shower into a way to refresh, restore and beautify the skin, from neck to chin.

Now Spongeables unique formula is even better, with Multi-Sal Muscle Toner, a patented ingredient complex that smoothes and tones with natural Rhodofiltrat Sea Extract to enhance microcirculation and help prevent dimpling on fatty areas. description: Developed by Dr. Irwin Smigel, world-renowned "Father of Aesthetic Dentistry", this simple and easy-to-use system is clinically proven to give immediate results, up to 6 shades whiter teeth in just 30 days, without sensitivity. Toothpaste contains the unprecedented science behind supersmile, Calprox, a proprietary formula of encapsulated calcium peroxide and minerals. Calprox gently and effectively removes the sticky bio-film from teeth, to which plaque, bacteria and stains (such as coffee, tea, tobacco and red wine) adhere, without the risk of sensitivity. Sugar and alcohol free. With anti-bacterial benefits for a healthier mouth and fresher breath. Effectively delivers whitening and cleansing to hard-to-reach places between teeth as well. Patented 45 degree angled brush head, unique to Supersmile, features five tufted rows of DuPont soft, nylon bristles. Center bristles effectively clean below the gum line where plaque and bacteria can accumulate while angled side bristles polish the tooth surface. Ergonomically shaped Lucite handle guarantees the ADA recommended brushing angle is maintained. Number one toothbrush recommended by aesthetic dentists. Stands upright for hygienic drying. Kit provides a 30-day supply. Free of silica, parabens, sulfates, known allergens, animal by-products and BPA. It's also Kosher. An $80 value!6 Minutes To A Whiter Smile Kit includes:Professional Whitening Toothpaste Original Mint: safely lifts surface stains and effectively brightens teeth (1.4 oz); Professional Whitening Accelerator: a carbamide peroxide bleaching solution that accelerates the effects of the whitening toothpaste (1.2 oz); Professional Activating Rods: enhance whitening results by preparing tooth enamel and cleaning the surface of the tooth (5 ct); New Generation Toothbrush (Clear): guarantees a 45 angle during brushing, effectively cleaning under the gum line; Whitening Pre-Rinse: prepares the teeth for advanced whitening, also helping to prevent plaque and gum disease (5.0 oz)

Five unique hair removal attachments plus a pedicure buffer provide all the tools you need for closer, smoother, more efficient hair removal and body care. Dual Disc Epilator Head - Perfectly proportioned to provide wider surface coverage for more efficient hair removal on arms and legs. Sensitive Epilator Head - Thoroughly removes hair from softer, more sensitive areas of the body like underarm and bikini areas. Gentle Epilator Cap - Designed for quick, easy removal of thinner, shorter hairs without skin irritation. Pedicure Buffer - Gently buffs away rough, dry skin on the feet for soft, smooth results.

Key Features:

    Two Speeds

description: Introducing New Schick Quattro YOU, disposable razors for women uniquely designed to protect your skin and offer you a shave so close, you can skip a day or two. It's also designed so that you get fewer nicks and cuts.

catalogs: Bath & Body, Personal Care, Hair Removal
title: Organic Wax Body Sugar
description: Parissa Cane Sugar Organic Wax.  Made with certified organic cane sugar, this washable hair remover is gentle on skin and the environment.  Suitable for all hair types (bikini, upper-lip, under-arm) and it can also be used everywhere on the body.   Ideal for sensitive skin.  Comes with 30 reusable non-woven fabric strips and 3 wooden spatulas.  Quick guide on how to use:  Heat product Wax should be the consistency of soft, spreadable honey. If too cold or hard, heat open jar. Microwave: remove cap & seal. Place on a dish, then place in center of unit & heat on high for 20 sec. As microwaves vary, ALWAYS test temperature before use. Warmer: Place on Parissa Wax Warmer for 20 min. Lamp: Place directly under reading lamp for 20 min. Smooth on: Using edge of spatula, spread paper-thin layer of product in direction of hair growth. Apply strip: Immediately smooth down strip over product leaving end of strip extended beyond product. Rub strip to adhere well.  Zip-off immediately: Hold skin taut below strip with one hand. Use other to grasp lower end of strip and zip-off quickly in opposite direction of hair growth, keeping strip/ hand as close & parallel to the skin as possible. Repeat:  As needed. Hint: The same strip can be used several times.  With experience, you can cover larger areas with product and remove with one strip in quick, successive motions.

SheaMoisture's Story  Sofi Tucker started selling Shea Nuts at the village market in Bonthe, Sierra Leone in 1912. By age 19, the widowed mother of four was selling Shea Butter, African Black Soap and her homemade hair and skin preparations all over the countryside. Sofi Tucker was the Grandmother and SheaMoisture is her legacy. With this purchase you help empower disadvantaged women to realize a brighter, healthier future.      Ethically Traded Ingredients Sustainably Produced     Pioneering Community Commerce and Fair Trade Since 1912.     Tested on the Tucker family for four generations. Never on animals.

catalogs: Skin Care, Suncare, Sunscreen
title: Face Natural Skin Tone SPF 40
description:
CoTZ for Face Balanced Mineral Complex is a dermatologist recommended mineral sunscreen that feels silky soft and blends translucent with a sheer matte finish. CoTZ helps prevent heat build-up in the skin, which can damage the dermis. Also, helps prevent pre-mature skin aging (fine lines, wrinkles, sagging, and age spots), uneven skin tone and other serious problems.
CoTZ Balanced Mineral Complex blends to match skin tone:
- Leaves skin silky, soft & smooth
- Non-Shiny, Non-Greasy
- Layers invisible under makeup
- Weightless
CoTZ Balanced Mineral Complex for healthier skin:
- 100% Free of Oils, Fragrances, Preservatives, Parabens, PABA, Gluten, Phthalates
- Does not irritate or sting
- Gentle enough for all skin types
- Contains #1 & #2 rated sunscreen ingredients
- SPF 40 exceeds the level recommended by Skin Cancer Experts
- Provides broad spectrum UVA/UVB protection
- Photostable, will not breakdown when exposed to sunlight
- Water & Sweat Resistant
CoTZ sits invisibly on top of the skin and functions like thousands of mirrors to deflect UVA/UVB rays before the rays can penetrate the skin.
CoTZ is 100% Free of chemical sunscreen ingredients, here's why: Chemical sunscreens absorb UVA/UVB rays into the skin and transform the rays into heat, which can damage the dermis.
CoTZ has products for every skin type and member of the Family: Cotz PURE (100% Natural sunscreen)

description: Fake a just-back-from-vacay bronze with this updated, skin-loving version of Tarte's best-selling Brazilliance Self-Tanner. Now infused with a powerful boost of natural exfoliators and moisturizers, you'll get a natural-looking, deep-toned tan within just four hours PLUS+ skin that feels sexy, smooth and hydrated. title: Body Perfection Gel
description: It's NOT a self-tanner. It's MORE that a bronzer. It's an Instant Skin Smoothing Body Bronzer and Moisturizer that lasts all day into the night. No exfoliation, streaks, or self-tanning smell...just a sun-kissed glow!How does it work? Body Perfection Gel instantly blurs the  appearance of dry skin, uneven skin tone, redness, rough skin, varicose veins even stretch marks. Hyaluronic microspheres help to firm, tone and hydrate. Shea Butter moisturizes and Ceramides lock in moisture.DHA, synthetic fragrance, talc, wax, sulfate and phthalate free formulation

catalogs: Skin Care, Suncare, Sunscreen
title: Pure & Free Baby Sunblock Lotion SPF 60
description: Neutrogena Pure & Free Baby Sunblock Lotion SPF 60 provides superior broad-spectrum UVA/UVB protection with Purescreen, a physical sunblock. Purescreen is fragrance free and contains titanium dioxide and zinc oxide, naturally-sourced sunscreen ingredients that are gentle on baby's delicate skin.Hypoallergenic. Oil-free & PABA-free. Fragrance-free. Waterproof. Sweatproof.

catalogs: Skin Care, Suncare, Sunscreen
title: Online Only Complexion Protection
description: As a Million Dollar Tan girl, you already know that sitting in the sun is no way to get a glow. Your gorgeous skin needs a shield from the sun's harsh, drying rays. If you've been relying on the minimal protection in makeup and moisturizers, then you need Complexion Protection, a high-performance, SPF 50 sunscreen. This oil-free, sheer booster gives all-day sun protection to keep your skin looking young, healthy and utterly fabulous. Apply under makeup and you'll be blocking 98% of harmful UV rays, reducing your risk of sunspots and premature aging.

catalogs: Bath & Body, Suncare, Self-Tanning & Bronzing
title: Online Only Shade Upgrade Extreme
description: The perfect Million Dollar Tan needs the perfect finishing touch-and makeup that matches your new gorgeous glow is definitely a must! Simply mix a few drops with a small amount of liquid foundation and your makeup will get a boost of intense color to match your tan. It's easy to achieve the perfect tone even if your color changes daily! This lightweight formula mixes effortlessly with any foundation, and also gives skin a subtle, glamorous sheen. While their regular strength Shade Upgrade is designed for any tanner needing an extra hint of color, Shade Upgrade Extreme is perfect for the ultra-bronzed who need a deeper, richer color to match their tan. The search for the perfect makeup shade is over!

catalogs: Makeup, Face, Bronzer
title: Per-fekt 10 Liquid Gold Illuminating Perfector
description: What it is?This next generation silky smooth illuminating gel lotion Per-fekt's and enhances the look of the body, face or hair leaving a silky smooth golden glow.  Per-fekt 10 liquid gold illuminating perfector is a one of a kind 10 n 1 perfector that makes you look and feel better than you ever looked or felt.  It's refreshing and uplifting, adding luster and radiance like you've never seen before.With green tea, verbena and avocado oil New innovation:A 10 n 1 multi-tasking miracle that can be used on the body, face or hair. Body: An understated luminescence imparts a delightful dewiness. Light reflecting tint gives a sheer flattering glow. Radiance blurs minor imperfections leaving a golden glow.; Face: Achieve subtle luminosity. This one-of-a-kind formula features ultra-fine light reflecting pearls that melt into your skin for polished, natural-looking radiance.; Hair: A shimmering leave in conditioner. Restores elasticity, enhances shine, protects, smooths, softens, and fights frizz.Benefits:Lift: Infused with an innovative blend of plant extracts to lift, firm and tighten; Treat: With omega 3 and vitamin B6; Gloss: Rich, luxurious gel lotion illuminates for instant luminosity; Detox: With rosemary leaf extract and camelia leaf extract; Protect: With antioxidant rich Japanese green tea extract; Smooth: Avocado oil and sunflower seed oil softens and smooths; Hydrate: With glycerin and shea butter; Energize: Caffeine wakes up and restores radiance; Condition: With natural verbena extract; Illuminate: With subtle light reflecting particles Vegan and cruelty free.

catalogs: Gifts, Bath & Body Gifts
title: Online Only Mini Coco Oil Travel Kit
description: The modern option for coconut oil lovers. Organic to Green Coco Oil is a proprietary infusion of coconut oils that won't turn solid. For sensitive skin, non-comedogenic, fast absorbing. This kit features five different Coco Oil options. Coco Oil Vanilla Chamomile is a blend of vanilla, chamomile, calendula, and aloe. This soothing formula is perfect for sensitive and delicate skin, and it also aids sunburns. Coco Oil Ginger is infused with ginger, seabuckthorn berry and cherimoya. The perfect inflammation healer.Coco Oil Jasmine Ylang Ylang is for dry skin. This hydrating formula is infused with Icelandic moss, watermelon scents and fresh floral. Coco Oil Rose addresses the signs of aging with three different forms of rose, rich with vitamin A & C. This is the perfect combination for mature skin. Coco Oil Lemon is great for oily or blemished prone skin, this gentle clarifying formula infused with red raspberry and burdock extracts, has anti-bacterial properties to help prevent breakouts.Mini Coco Oil Travel Kit includes:Ginger Coconut Oil for Face - Healing (1.8 oz.); Rose Coconut Oil for Face - Anti-Aging (1.8 oz.); Vanilla Chamomile Coconut Oil for Face - Sensitive & Soothing (1.8 oz.); Jasmine Ylang Ylang Coconut Oil for Face - Moisturizing (1.8 oz.); Lemon Coconut Oil for Face - Purifying for Oily Skin (1.8 oz.); Travel size Jute Draw String Bag

description:
This set has Million Dollar Tan's best selling sunless tanning formula, Mermaid Mousse and Mermaid Mousse Face along with Blend Friend Mitt Set. Paired with All That Shimmers, an instant body bronzer and Complexion Protection a high-performance, SPF 50 facial sunscreen. Mermaid Mousse is truly whipped tan perfection-it's the most luxurious tanning product Million Dollar Tan has ever created. Ultra-lightweight and easy to apply, this dazzling mousse gives a subtle instant bronze color, with a deep, gorgeous tan developing over the next few hours. The light-as-air formula soaks in effortlessly, and hydrating botanicals provide serious skin nourishment. Million Dollar Tan color gives a gradual, buildable tan that always looks natural.
